entry.title: "Digital Machine" office opening
entry.content: The event took place this weekeend at Danylovskie Manufaktury, Moscow which is where the DM new office is located. Opening was held by DM CEO who’s name I forgot. The spectacular elevation of Duckie’s Friend, Russian writer Dmitry Evgenyevich Galkovsky was accompanied with tragical music that symbolised his hard path to SUCCESS.
